issue.title: val can't move joints after a fall

content.raw: I'll cc @nkoenig since we are still formulating the rules and scoring for recovering from a fall, but I believe we will add the ability to re-harness the robot and resume operation from a standing position. This will require a slight modification to the gazebo harness plugin, and I am taking a look at it right now.
